name: Indiana Duck
description:
This game was made during a Game Jam hosted by the Game and Media Entertainment Developers (GAMED) club at University Wisconsin Whitewater. The theme was Discovery and Meme... yes meme.  

In this game you will be exploring a lost temple to find the last missing artifact Indiana Duck needs in order to complete his priceless artifact collection.

Controls

Q: Quack of Courage

W A S D: To move

Space: To Jump and Glide

@JolyGonZ: Modeling

@Lebrra: Programming

@WesMcW: Programming and Art

Song -> "Spacial Winds" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
